title: 08 - Hidden Talent
description: The Hidden Talent can be described as a more refined, more sensitive Expression Number that manifests between the ages of 20 and 30 approximately. It is that willpower that during this period of life encourages us to undertake, to understand and deal better with people, to learn new things. An added sensitivity to the characteristics of our Expression Number.

1.title: Hidden Talent: 1
1.data: It is the talent revealed for independence, for initiative. It may be the time to start your own business. The talent to give a new boost to an existing business or to achieve a new position at work. It is optimism combined with strong convictions, leadership, physical vigor, and progressive attitudes. An added reinforcement to individuality, determination, and entrepreneurship. Be careful with arrogance and overconfidence.

2.title: Hidden Talent: 2
2.data: It is the talent of diplomacy and the collaborative spirit that may sometimes be lacking due to excessive individualism. It may be the goodwill to help others. In fearless and eager people, it can be the sensitivity, intuition, and balance needed for impartial judgment in legal disputes. It is the awakening of intuition leading to a more subtle, more cordial vision in relationships with people. Be careful not to become dependent.

3.title: Hidden Talent: 3
3.data: It is the talent of creativity, imagination, perhaps even the awakening of popularity, overcoming shyness, and improving social interaction when having to expose oneself in public. It is facing life with more joy, with an increased ability to write, speak in public, and express oneself. The awakening of artistic talents. Be careful not to become childish when exposing yourself in public due to this eventual loss of shyness or become careless in the way you dress.

4.title: Hidden Talent: 4
4.data: It is the talent of leadership, administration; a firm hand in discipline and organization. New skills in building or maintaining machines, in renovating or constructing properties. Talent in the technical field. The functionality that may be missing to realize your projects. Overcoming procrastination. Determination and objectivity in achievements, judgments, resolutions, and learning. Be careful with excesses, be less demanding, controlling, and rigid.

5.title: Hidden Talent: 5
5.data: It is the talent of versatility, of objective communication in contrast to a somewhat rigid personality. The love for freedom that now, in maturity, is expressed with more creativity. It may be an added sensitivity in the senses, sensuality, boldness, and feelings. It may be the impulse that was missing for a change in attitude that will contribute to the improvement of society and a less conservative view of one's own personality. Be careful not to become an irritating and stubborn person.

6.title: Hidden Talent: 6
6.data: It is the talent that can reinforce generosity, kindness, and compassion for those in need and in relationships with others. It may also be a new talent for the arts, especially performing arts. An ease in harmonizing with balance the common interests of all. A sense of responsibility and leadership. A new way of seeing the common good with humanitarianism. Be careful not to give too much to the good of others and become a slave to your generosity.

7.title: Hidden Talent: 7
7.data: It is the talent of seeking perfection in all activities undertaken. The more refined meticulousness and sense in seeking the best of oneself with the least effort. It may be the beginning of the search for philosophical and esoteric subjects, spirituality, self-knowledge, rationality, knowledge, or scientific research. The awakening of psychic powers. Be careful not to become a perfectionist and unkind person.

8.title: Hidden Talent: 8
8.data: It is the talent for more charismatic and idealistic leadership. It may be the beginning of new administrative capacities, a new sense of organization and authority. The discovery of inner power, the spiritual power that governs the physical world. The awakening of generosity, value judgment, and authority. Responsible social awareness. Spirituality. Be careful not to become a domineering and controlling person.

9.title: Hidden Talent: 9
9.data: It is the talent for more charismatic and humanitarian leadership in general. It may be a new aptitude for wiser considerations and judgments; it may also be an increase in creativity for oratory, literature, and the arts in general. Feelings of compassion for humanity. Spirituality, humanitarianism, and sensitivity. Life experiences leading to reflections and maturity. Be careful with manipulative people who may bring frustrations.

11.title: Hidden Talent: 11
11.data: It is the talent for leadership encouraged by noble ideals, by diplomacy. The awakening of broader talents that are part of your personality. Humanitarian vision and spirituality. Expansiveness of intellect and intelligence. It may be the balance of thought at the highest level, along with emotions, being directed to a higher degree of spirituality. Be careful with the possibility of doubts about your abilities, which can bring insecurity.

22.title: Hidden Talent: 22
22.data: It is the talent for leadership marked by diplomacy and idealism. It may be the awakening of broader talents and inventiveness that are part of your personality. A sense of balance, social responsibility. Material and intellectual growth giving way to a more optimistic attitude towards life, more centered on self-realization. Be careful not to corrupt yourself by exceeding your powers, maintain dignity.
